message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I am only willing to pay up to $8,800 for the product. I hope this aligns better with its value to me.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. However, I'm looking for something closer to $9,200.  Would that be workable for you?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my assessment of the product's value, I am able to increase my offer to $9,000. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.
